data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Madrid to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Madrid, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 6,284,631 lost in Madrid that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Madrid with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain has a population of 6,386,900.

We estimate Madrid has 102,269 people who might know Jesus, 4,835,420 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,449,211 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Madrid that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
